name: Deathstench - N.O.X - 1 left
description:
DEATHSTENCH is the duo of Darea Plantin and John-Paul Whetzel from the misanthropic black doom project Welter In Thy Blood. 

The music of DEATHSTENCH varies from dark ambient to power electronics, black metal to death industrial and all points in between. 

With the common theme of death, obsession, murder/suicide and psychosis from a black Stygian abyss that you can almost feel. Culling and manipulating sounds Darea Plantin conducts an orchestra of field recorded demonic possession. John Paul Whetzel lays down some serious vocals with lyrics themed in occult incantations and misanthropic hate that coalesces perfectly with the hypnotic droning black tones. 

Artwork by Niels Geybels.

Packiging:
zeitgeists handmade heavy silver cardstock cover
info inlay  
obistrip

name: Architeuthis Rex - Eleusis
description:
Imagine having a dream that is filled with different instruments and musicians playing experimental, percussion but totally aware of each other and the sound that are creating. Architeuthis Rex surprised me and with this release they were able to succeed the maximum of beauty.

Thank you for this great journey, Architeuthis Rex.

Artwork by ZG and Niels Geybels.
Logo design by Keith Utech. 

The packaging:

oversized clear cassette-shell 
24 pgs booklet, full color pictures with artwork on orange and red vellum
handbound booklet
color printed obistrip

name: NECRO - By Terence Hannum - 9 left
description: A Meditation on Death. A selection of found images of a Roman catacomb, combined with gouache drawings and a compendium of the use of the word 'Necro' throughout profane songs, albums and performers. Red vellum covers, black & white and black & red insides. In Brown envelope with red ink. Edition of 50 European orders only please, for all US orders please order from Terence Hannum here.

name: Tom Ogden - Wet Fingers for the Flame - Poetry Zine - 2 left
description: Wet Fingers for the Flame By Tom Ogden With great pleasure I present you: Tom Ogden. This young guy is so talented that I begged him to have me publish his newest work 'Wet Fingers for the Flame'. You might know him from his first zine 'Mother Long Legs' (which is available at Calico Grounds). "Wet Fingers for the Flame" contains 14 beautiful, contemporary poems. The booklet is hand bound and comes in a wax sealed envelope. The booklet is limited to 50 copies.

name: Jet Fueled Horses - Dead Astronauts CS
description:
Jet Fueled Horses is F. Sean Martin and Max G Morton. 

Dead Astronauts trashing the Cosmos and 20 minutes of crystal cyclones to free your mind. 

Psychonauts of Uncharted Wastelandscapes forever Lost. 

Black Hole Youth. 

Savage Nomads of the Apocalypse Junkyard, pin-balling through the Dust Sprinkled Battle Fields.

Indestructible Wolves of the Space Ghettos.

Limited to 123 copies.

name: Hallow - s/t
description: This is the CD version of HALLOW following the Youth Attack/Teardrops vinyl editions from 2009. HALLOW is both the name and soundtrack that accompanied Mark McCoy's debut drawing exhibition at LA's HOPE Gallery in 2009. The content from the exhibition was designed to unfurl like a broken seal of revelations along a horizon of decay and abandonment. Sonically speaking, looming perilously under a wash of malformation and debris are nine musical compositions to correspond with each of the drawings featured in the show. The sensual packaging of this CD is intricately handmade and crafted in a luxurious uncoated archival carton and sealed with a wax-stamp. The artwork on the cover is entirely embossed and no ink is used. The exterior is heavy virgin acid-free paper. To enter one must break the seals to open a folio containing nine reproduction prints of each drawing. Standing on its own as an object of beauty, this project raises the bar of packaging and presentation like never before seen. All in all, an monumental effort on our part. Words by the almighty Mark McCoy Limited to 222. More products of my other label Totalvernichtung / Todesstunde can be found: here ----> If your country isn't listed for shipping, please contact me so that I can include it your country to give you the right rates. Otherwise you pay for elsewhere, which is world-rates.
